lead_paragraph: An annual report by the Committee to Protect Journalists said the threats, from nonstate actors and governments, were especially acute for freelancers.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Worldwide; Growing Dangers for Journalists Cited
headline.main: Journalists Facing Biggest Threats in Recent Times, Advocacy Group Says

snippet: An annual report by the Committee to Protect Journalists said the threats, from nonstate actors and governments, were especially acute for freelancers.
abstract: Report by press advocacy group Committee to Protect Journalists finds that rise of criminal gangs and militant extremists who kidnap and kill reporters, as well as related government repression in name of counterterrorism, have created enormous threat to journalism worldwide.
